description: Colorado Crude Oil Rail Terminals. Major crude oil rail terminals in Colorado. Based on publicly available data from a variety of sources with varying scales and levels of accuracy. This layer is not visible if zoomed in beyond 1:1,000,000 scale. Colorado Oil Pipelines from the US Energy Information Administration
